Package com.twilio.jwt.accesstoken

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Grant  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessToken
    Access Token use to grant privileges to Twilio resources.
    AccessToken.Builder
    Builder used to construct a Access Token.
    ConversationsGrant
    Grant used to access Twilio Conversations.
    IpMessagingGrant
    Grant used to access Twilio IP Messaging.
    SyncGrant
    Grant used to access Twilio Sync.
    VideoGrant
    Grant used to access Twilio Video For more information see: https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/access-tokens
    VoiceGrant
    Grant used to access Twilio Conversations.
